statements: SELECT * FROM bioengineered_plants
SELECT plant_name, species FROM bioengineered_plants WHERE plant_id = 1
SELECT plant_name, species, genetic_traits FROM bioengineered_plants WHERE breeding_program_id = 2
SELECT * FROM bioengineered_plants WHERE species = 'Rose'
SELECT plant_name, species FROM bioengineered_plants WHERE breeding_program_id = 1 ORDER BY plant_name DESC
SELECT plant_name, species FROM bioengineered_plants WHERE species = 'Rose'
SELECT * FROM bioengineered_plants ORDER BY plant_name ASC
SELECT plant_name, genetic_traits FROM bioengineered_plants WHERE breeding_program_id = 1
SELECT DISTINCT species FROM bioengineered_plants
SELECT plant_name, species, genetic_traits FROM bioengineered_plants WHERE breeding_program_id = 2
SELECT * FROM Bioengineered_Plants
SELECT plant_name, genetic_traits FROM Bioengineered_Plants WHERE breeding_program_id = 1
SELECT plant_name, genetic_traits FROM Bioengineered_Plants ORDER BY plant_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Breeding_Programs
SELECT program_name, program_description, lead_scientist FROM Breeding_Programs
SELECT * FROM Bioengineered_Plants WHERE plant_name = 'Sunflower';
SELECT plant_name, genetic_traits FROM Bioengineered_Plants WHERE breeding_program_id = 1 ORDER BY plant_name ASC;

SELECT plant_id, plant_name, genetic_traits, program_name FROM Bioengineered_Plants INNER JOIN Breeding_Programs ON Bioengineered_Plants.breeding_program_id = Breeding_Programs.breeding_program_id WHERE Breeding_Programs.lead_scientist = 'Dr. Smith';

SELECT plant_name, breeding_program_id, program_name, lead_scientist FROM Bioengineered_Plants LEFT JOIN Breeding_Programs ON Bioengineered_Plants.breeding_program_id = Breeding_Programs.breeding_program_id WHERE breeding_program_id IS NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT breeding_program_id, program_name FROM Breeding_Programs;
SELECT * FROM PlantTraits;
SELECT plant_id, trait_name, observation_date FROM PlantTraits WHERE observation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date, end_date FROM BreedingPrograms ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT trait_name, trait_value FROM PlantTraits WHERE trait_name LIKE 'color%';
SELECT plant_id, breeding_date FROM PlantBreeding ORDER BY breeding_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM PlantTraits WHERE trait_name = 'Height'
SELECT plant_id, trait_name, trait_value FROM PlantTraits ORDER BY observation_date DESC
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM BreedingPrograms WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT plant_id, trait_name, trait_value, observation_date FROM PlantTraits WHERE trait_name LIKE '%color%'
SELECT breeding_id, plant_id, program_id, breeding_date FROM PlantBreeding
SELECT * FROM Plants;
SELECT plant_name, growth_rate FROM Plants;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM BreedingPrograms;
SELECT trait_name, trait_description FROM Traits;
SELECT Plants.plant_name, PlantTraits.trait_value FROM Plants JOIN PlantTraits ON Plants.plant_id = PlantTraits.plant_id;
SELECT * FROM Plants;
SELECT plant_name, growth_rate FROM Plants WHERE growth_rate > 0.5;
SELECT plant_name, trait_name, trait_value FROM Plants JOIN PlantTraits ON Plants.plant_id = PlantTraits.plant_id JOIN Traits ON PlantTraits.trait_id = Traits.trait_id WHERE Plants.plant_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM BreedingPrograms WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01';

SELECT Plants.plant_name, Traits.trait_name, PlantTraits.trait_value FROM Plants JOIN PlantTraits ON Plants.plant_id = PlantTraits.plant_id JOIN Traits ON PlantTraits.trait_id = Traits.trait_id WHERE Traits.trait_name = 'Blooming' ORDER BY Plants.plant_name ASC;
SELECT plant_name, trait1, trait2 FROM PlantTraits WHERE growth_pattern = 'Climbing';
SELECT date, height, width FROM GrowthData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT marker_name, gene_variant, location FROM GeneticMarkers WHERE plant_id = 5;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM BreedingPrograms WHERE lead_scientist = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT plant_name, harvest_date, yield FROM HarvestData ORDER BY yield DESC;
SELECT plant_name, trait1, trait2 FROM PlantTraits WHERE growth_pattern = 'Climbing'
SELECT plant_name, growth_pattern, trait1 FROM PlantTraits WHERE trait2 = 'Drought Resistant' ORDER BY plant_name DESC
SELECT * FROM GrowthData WHERE height > 50 AND width < 30
SELECT plant_name, trait1, trait2, location FROM PlantTraits INNER JOIN GeneticMarkers ON PlantTraits.plant_id = GeneticMarkers.plant_id
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, lead_scientist FROM BreedingPrograms WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01'
